review_data.title: 100% the best meal, and the best view, and I wish I could be there now.
review_data.content: This is absolutely worth getting off the beaten path for. The view is spectacular. The food is delicious and beyond the best value you will find in Zurich, and overall, it is a place that feels healthy and wholesome.

review_data.title: Hospital restaurant but quite good quality
review_data.content: This is part of the hospital and park. As it's open terrace, very convinient for parents to watch kids playing while having coffee. Reasonable price with good quality of buffet lunch for beaf, pasta and salad.

review_data.title: At the top of my ‘Best Cheap, Complete Meals in the City’
review_data.content: There may be other specialized (kebap, Asian) cheap places in the city to eat, but none of them offers such a complete, hearty meal at such an exceptional price! Epi Park is part rehab clinic, conference center, school and of course the Epi Park cafeteria...More

review_data.title: Very nice view and reasonable prices
review_data.content: Probably one of the best views you can get in Zurich. Food is good but it is self-service. If you have a car to reach and you want to nice view while you have good and reasonable cheap food, this is your place to go.
